equipment.name: Barbed Sword
base_affixes: +23.25% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +11.4% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Bone Spirit</text> deals increased damage based on distance traveled, up to <text class='c_random'>35.03%</text>.
+18.75% Damage to Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Wave</text> fires two additional waves, each dealing <text class='c_random'>73.84%</text> less damage than the previous.

equipment.name: Warlord Greathelm
strikethrough_affixes: When hit while not <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, a magical bubble is summoned around you for <text class='c_random'>5.39</text> seconds. While standing in the bubble, Players are <text class='c_important'><u>Immune</u></text>. Can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>135</text> seconds.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.64%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>98.61%</text>.

equipment.name: Chain
base_affixes: Whenever your <text class='c_important'>Blood</text> Skills <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> you gain <text class='c_random'>70.38%</text> Attack Speed for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.
added_affixes: +21% Movement Speed for VALUE2 Seconds After Killing an Elite

equipment.name: Temerity
base_affixes: Effects that Heal you beyond <text class='c_number'>150%</text> Life grant you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> up to <text class='c_random'>108.05%</text> of your Maximum Life that lasts for <text class='c_number'>12</text> seconds. Potions can be used while at full Life.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Heal +0.44 Life

equipment.name: Molten Lotus
base_affixes: +6.75% Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies
strikethrough_affixes: When a segment of <text class='c_important'>Bone Prison</text> is destroyed or expires, it deals <text class='c_random'>0.13</text> damage in an area around itself.
9.59% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
added_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. Each additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>66.74%</text> of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

equipment.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
base_affixes: When you pick up <text class='c_random'>7.5</text> <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text>, a free <text class='c_important'>Bone Spirit</text> is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.

equipment.name: Band
strikethrough_affixes:
Gain <text class='c_random'>36.67%</text> increased damage to a set of damage types for <text class='c_number'>1.5</text> seconds.  This effect alternates between <text class='c_number'>2</text> sets: 
<li>Fire, Lightning, and Physical. 
<li>Cold, Poison, and Shadow.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>29.99%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>59.98%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.

equipment.name: Runic Gloves
base_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>69.03%</text> of normal damage.
+11.25% Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +19.55% Chance to Slow

equipment.name: Boneweave Treads
base_affixes: While <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text> and for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds after, you gain <text class='c_random'>37.22%</text> increased Movement Speed and can move freely through enemies.
